name: Heavy Weapon Deluxe
description: It's shoot-'em-up arcade action at its best! Use an incredible assortment of heavy artillery to blast away enemy tanks and planes, and fight your way to victory. What are you waiting for? Pull yourself up by your bootstraps and get into the action! Blast your way through 19 missions packed with peril.
minimum_requirements: Minimum Requirements: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP, 128 MB RAM, 500MHz or faster, DirectX: 7.0

reviews.review_text: Best game to kill time.. 6/10 . Actually im buying this game because i already played it before in around 2007 just to bring back some childhood memories..

Is the tank the weapon, or are your weapons the weapon, and if so why the singular naming for a plural set of objects? Is Heavy Weapon Deluxe really a screed about the division of self from society and how we are in truth a greater, unperceived whole, meaning our identity is beyond our control and indeed an artificial construct we bolt together piecemeal from the social experience of those with whom we identify?  Dammit, Sartre, stop making me think and just give me Peggle 2 already.
Do you like weapons of mass destruction and just mindlessly blasting away enemies? Then this game is for you!

2 words. SO AWESOME! Heavy Weapon is a super adicting game that keeps you coming back for more gameplay. I have been playing this game ever since I was 5 and back then I was frustrated out of my mind but when i saw this on Steam i was like YAY i get to play this again. So I reccomend this game because it gives you a fun and addicting gameplay experience and I hope you like my reveiw

This game probably won't entertain anyone that doesn't have nostalgia for it, and those like myself who do will resent the new pathetic and useless controls. The game also lacks any sense of appropriate resolution control and resembles the poorest of poor, half ♥♥♥ attempt of a port. Do not buy.
